caption: Table 1. Comparison with SoTA methods on the KITTI test set at IoU = 0.7. Our DDMP-3D achieves new SoTA performance.

caption: Table 3. 3D object detection (AP3D) performance for "Cyclist" and "Pedestrian" on KITTI val split and test set ("val1"/test).

Table 4. Ablative analysis on KITTI "val1" split set for AP3D and APBEV at IoU = 0.7. Experiment group (I) is our baseline method. 
Different experiment settings are explored: (II) using depth-conditioned dynamic message propagation with single scale, (III) performing 
multi-scale dynamic message propagation, (IV) our full approach with auxiliary center-regression task.
